refresher.title: What is a Dashboard?
refresher.content:
# Dashboard Meaning

A dashboard shows important data at one place.

Examples:
- Total users
- Orders count
- Revenue
- Activity logs

---

Dashboards focus on **clarity**, not decoration.

concept.title: Dashboard Features
concept.content:
- Sidebar navigation
- Top header
- Summary cards
- Tables
- Charts
- Protected routes

concept3.title: Layout Thinking
concept3.content:
Dashboards use layout patterns:

- Sidebar stays fixed
- Content changes by route
- Header shows global actions
